paused.title: Resume paused backup
paused.description: You have paused a backup that isn't finished it yet.

default.title: No backups yet
default.description: You haven't created any backups yet. Create one by pressing the button below.

pending.title: Backup pending
pending.description: Another folder is currently being backed up. The initial backup for this folder is in the queue.

initial.title: Running initial backup
initial.description: This is the initial backup of this folder, so it may take a while. BlinkDisk only uploads changed files after this, making all future backups much faster and lighter.
